// constants
import{LayoutActionTypes}from'./constants';export var changeLayout=function changeLayout(layout){return{type:LayoutActionTypes.CHANGE_LAYOUT,payload:layout};};export var changeLayoutWidth=function changeLayoutWidth(width){return{type:LayoutActionTypes.CHANGE_LAYOUT_WIDTH,payload:width};};export var changeMenuPositions=function changeMenuPositions(position){return{type:LayoutActionTypes.CHANGE_MENU_POSITIONS,payload:position};};export var changeSidebarTheme=function changeSidebarTheme(sidebarTheme){return{type:LayoutActionTypes.CHANGE_SIDEBAR_THEME,payload:sidebarTheme};};export var changeSidebarType=function changeSidebarType(sidebarType){return{type:LayoutActionTypes.CHANGE_SIDEBAR_TYPE,payload:sidebarType};};export var toggleSidebarUserInfo=function toggleSidebarUserInfo(showSidebarUserInfo){return{type:LayoutActionTypes.TOGGLE_SIDEBAR_USER_INFO,payload:showSidebarUserInfo};};export var changeTopbarTheme=function changeTopbarTheme(topbarTheme){return{type:LayoutActionTypes.CHANGE_TOPBAR_THEME,payload:topbarTheme};};export var showRightSidebar=function showRightSidebar(){return{type:LayoutActionTypes.SHOW_RIGHT_SIDEBAR};};export var hideRightSidebar=function hideRightSidebar(){return{type:LayoutActionTypes.HIDE_RIGHT_SIDEBAR};};
